column1: 4.8.4.4	  Summary of evidence and recommendations for the management of urinary fistula
Use magnetic resonance imaging for diagnosis and characterisation of urethral diverticula,   with urethroscopy, voiding cystourethrogram and ultrasound where necessary.
Offer surgical removal of symptomatic urethral diverticulum.
